description:
- Created this blog series while working at **DataFlair**
- The series focuses on **introductory PyTorch concepts** and hands-on demo projects
- Published on the **DataFlair website**
- Topics covered include:
  - PyTorch fundamentals
  - Building neural networks
  - Implementing deep learning models

This is my YouTube playlist where I explain the concepts of LLMs in a simple and easy-to-understand way.
I cover topics like:
- What are LLMs?
- How do they work?
- Applications of LLMs
- Future of LLMs
This is still in production, and I will be adding more videos to the playlist in the future.
